pkgmetadata.longdescription: Creation, Reading and Validation of 'mzqc' Files // Reads, writes and validates 'mzQC' files. The 'mzQC' format is a standardized file format for the exchange, transmission, and archiving of quality metrics derived from biological mass spectrometry data, as defined by the HUPO-PSI (Human Proteome Organisation - Proteomics Standards Initiative) Quality Control working group. See https://hupo-psi.github.io/mzQC/ for details.
